snippet: Andy Samberg, who helped pioneer the popular “Saturday Night Live” digital shorts like “Lazy Sunday,” “I’m on a Boat” and “I Just Had Sex,” said that leaving the show was “one of the hardest decisions I’ve ever made.”
abstract: Andy Samberg, who helped pioneer the popular “Saturday Night Live” digital shorts like “Lazy Sunday,” “I’m on a Boat” and “I Just Had Sex,” said that leaving the show was “one of the hardest decisions I’ve ever made.”

headline.main: Andy Samberg Confirms He's Leaving 'Saturday Night Live'
headline.print_headline: Andy Samberg to Leave ‘Saturday Night Live’
